item.description:
Join NHC's Antoinette for a big Valentine's Day blowout at her place in Hamden!

Members of the "40's Let's Get Together and have Fun (30ish to 50ish)" Meetup group will also be attending.

Bring some snacks to share, and a bottle or ten of your favorite adult beverage.

Antoinette’s address in Hamden will be sent out to “Yes” and “Maybe” RSVP’s on the afternoon of the 6th. If you have any questions, Antoinette can be reached at 203-230-0435.
item.name: Valentine's Day Party at Antoinette's Place
